content: **free pattern from järbo ** *january 2022 some of you seemed to have problems increasing in the sleeves within the motif so i draw a chart for each size you will find it here 1 hope that helps kindly hélène* > january 2025 if you like the maja > cardigan you may enjoy as well maja > light 2 the top down dk version > instructions are both for a pullover > and cardigan warmly hélène ***we are happy to be able to share our patterns with you for free unfortunately we are not able to answer dm s here on ravelry however we hope you will like the pattern and will enjoy seeing your project come to life *** **inspiration and free patterns** follow järbo on instagram 3 **reseller map** jarbo se 4 - brand website in swedish find a reseller 5 - nordic region in swedish **our official online stores** eddna se 6 eddna no 7 eddna de 8 eddna at 9 eddna nl 10 eddna be 11 järbo is a swedish brand established in 1896 we offer nordic design selected yarns and accessories in stores and online 1 https //icelandicknitter com/maja-cardigan-the-full-story-and-the-sleeves-charts/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/maja-light 3 https //www instagram com/jarbogarn/ 4 https //www jarbo se/ 5 https //www jarbo se/hitta-butik 6 https //www eddna se/ 7 https //www eddna no/ 8 https //www eddna de/ 9 https //www eddna at/ 10 https //www eddna nl/ 11 https //www eddna be/
